_sText:
Hello friends,

I made this map at the end of 2016 and never released it here.

The gimmick to this map is that each teleport is to a random section of the map. Once you complete 5 sections you complete the map. The RNG in CS:S can be iffy so sometimes you get the same thing often. https://youtu.be/bdEyCMLRbCs?t=13

This was intended to be a proof of concept for another much more complex map but I ended up finishing it and never making the other map lmao.

I've included the source files so you can see how it works.
